examples: She looked at him with contempt.
I shall treat that suggestion with the contempt it deserves.
Trataré esa sugerencia con el desprecio que merece.
His treatment of his children is beneath contempt (= so bad that it is not even worth feeling contempt for).
El trato que da a sus hijos está por debajo del desprecio (= tan malo que ni siquiera vale la pena sentir desprecio).
Politicians seem to be generally held in contempt by ordinary people.
La gente corriente parece despreciar a los políticos en general.
